title: mm报错 求大佬帮忙
author: 天启-麒麟
txt_content:
本帖最后由 麒麟喵o 于 2020-5-17 18:01 编辑 

报错在下面，我有一个怪物写了lunge技能之后，一触发他就后台报错，而且lunge和leap技能没一点用处
lunge和leap的那个技能都是和官网写的一模一样的，游戏版本是1.12.2，核心是spigot核心，mm版本是v4.5.1-2584
谢谢大佬了=-=

[MythicMobs] Plugin MythicMobs v4.5.1-2584 generated an exception while executing task 348088
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: x not finite
        at org.bukkit.util.NumberConversions.checkFinite(NumberConversions.java:115) ~[spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at org.bukkit.util.Vector.checkFinite(Vector.java:624) ~[spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.entity.CraftEntity.setVelocity(CraftEntity.java:242) ~[spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.mechanics.LungeMechanic.castAtEntity(LungeMechanic.java:40) ~[?:?]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.SkillMechanic.lambda$executeTargetedEntitySkill$3(SkillMechanic.java:451) ~[?:?]
        at java.lang.Iterable.forEach(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_111]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.SkillMechanic.executeTargetedEntitySkill(SkillMechanic.java:447) ~[?:?]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.SkillMechanic.executeSkills(SkillMechanic.java:408) ~[?:?]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.SkillMechanic.execute(SkillMechanic.java:270) ~[?:?]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.mobs.MythicMob.lambda$executeSkills$16(MythicMob.java:1012) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:76) ~[spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:52) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_111]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_111]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_111]




下面是那个lunge技能
- lunge{velocity=15;velocityY=5} @self ~onSpawn
真的和官网 wiki一模一样
下面是怪物的配置

技能1:  
  Type: armor_stand
  Pose:
    Head: 0,0,0
    Body: 0,0,0
    LeftArm: 0 to 0,0,0
    RightArm: 90 to 90,0,0
  Skills:
  - remove{delay=100} @self ~onSpawn
  - lunge{velocity=15;velocityY=5} @Self ~onSpawn
  Options:
    HasArms: true
    Invisible: true
    Marker: true
    ItemHand: 铁剑2
    Persistent: true

replies.author: 南柯郡守
replies.txt_content: 可能是lunge少设置一个x的值

replies.author: 天启-麒麟
replies.txt_content:
南柯郡守 发表于 2020-5-17 18:48
可能是lunge少设置一个x的值
v的那个就是x的值

replies.author: 南柯郡守
replies.txt_content:
麒麟喵o 发表于 2020-5-17 18:57
v的那个就是x的值

哦 他这个不是说没找到 是
x not finite
x不是无限的(直译
没有仔细研究过 所以我也不太清楚
建议配合mm的wiki食用

等等看有没有人给你完整补充吧
